item.title: Smithing help please delta 317
item.dc:creator: @lilmanx lilmanx
item.description:
@lilmanx wrote:

		case 436: //copper ore
			if (IsItemInBag(438) == true) {
				smelting[0] = 1;
				smelting[1] = 1;
				if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
					smelting[2] = 6;
				} else {
					smelting[2] = 7;
				}
				smelting[3] = 2349;
			} else {
				sendMessage("You need 1 copper ore and 1 tin ore to smelt 1 bronze bar.");
				return false;
			}
			break;
		case 438: //tin
			if (IsItemInBag(436) == true) {
				smelting[0] = 1;
				smelting[1] = 1;
				if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
					smelting[2] = 6;
				} else {
					smelting[2] = 7;
				}
				smelting[3] = 2349;
			} else {
				sendMessage("You need 1 copper ore and 1 tin ore to smelt 1 bronze bar.");
				return false;
			}
			break;

every time i make a bronze bark it only takes tin away
what do i need to fix?

Read full topic
